communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Dear Freedom of Information Officer,

Under the provisions of the [State] Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request access to and copies of the following records:

1) Expense Reports for Travel Expenses
Please provide the expense reports for travel expenses incurred by each member of the Board of Education for the period from August 1, 2022, to the present date. The Board members in question are:

Mark Kamberg
Robert Fallarino
Leonard Hirsch
Tasneem Meghji
David Keefe

2) Itemized Call Reports for District-Funded Cell Phones
I request the itemized call reports for district-funded cell phones for the following individuals for the period from August 1, 2022 to the present date:

Mark Kamberg
Dr. Danielle Gately

If you deny any part of this request, please cite each specific exemption you think justifies your refusal to release the information and notify me of the appeal procedures available under the law.
Please confirm receipt of this request. I look forward to your prompt response within the timeframe specified by the law.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mary Lee
